main.name: Colliders
main.description: A basic Collider plugin, inspired by the excellent SAT.js.

children.name: types
children.description: An Array of all available Collider types, e.g. 'box' or 'circle'. The first one must match the default type.

children.name: test
children.description: Test for a collision between 2 colliders (of any type). Returns true if they collide, false if they don't. The (empty) Response object will be filled with additional details.

arguments.name: response
arguments.description: An empty `Colliders.Response` object. This will be populated with some data about the collision.

children.name: testAll
children.description: Test for a collision between a collider (of any type) and an array of colliders. Returns true if there is a collision, false if there isn't. The (empty) Response object will be filled with additional details.

arguments.name: B
arguments.description: An array of Colliders to test A against.

arguments.name: callback
arguments.description: A callback function that will be called on every test.

arguments.name: collision
arguments.description: Whether the two Colliders collide. `true` if they are colliding, `false` otherwise.
